--part1_64.ab591e9.27a599a9_boundary
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

:::The Protectrons/Torca/Ratchet/Sideswipe/Sky 
Lynx/Orion/Airazor/Tigerhawk/Atma/Psuedo/Time 
Warp/Banzai-Tron/Hurricane/Hellbat/Wheeljack/Starscream/Bludgeon/Obsidian/Shar

pedge/Jetstorm/Godfather/Gigatron/The Skyscorchers/The 
Destrocons/Falcon/Snare::

::My Maximals hear the voice.  They all wondered what it was, but they were 
too damaged to speculate. Torca hears Klant saying he doesnt need a CR::
Torca: Klant, you were damaged in this battle. I think it would be best if 
you healed yourself. Remember, i have a gift to give to you once everything 
settles down.
~~~~~
::As they are walking, Tigerhawk and Airazor heard the voice::
Airazor: Tigerhawk, what was that?
Tigerhawk: I have no idea. Something must be happening somewhere on this 
planet.
::They continue their walk::
~~~~~
::Atma and Psuedo hear the voice as they are searching::
Psuedo: Did you hear something?
Atma: I was about to ask you the same question.
Psuedo: Alright, im officially freaked out now.
Atma: We'd better keep going.
::They continue on their travels::
~~~~~
Time Warp: Thats more like it.
::Time Warp heads in a direction he feels is right, after awhile, he hears 
the voice::
Time Warp: brother, did you hear what i just heard?
~~~~~
::Banzai-Tron, Hurricane, and Wheeljack hear the voice::
Hurricane: What was that?
Wheeljack: it probably was-
Banzai-Tron: I dont need your opinion, inventor, i say it was nothing! You 
arem both fools!
::He did hear it, but he didnt want them to know::
~~~~~
::Hellbat is unconsious in the CR chamber, so he doesnt hear it::
~~~~~
::Starscream, Bludgeon, and Obsidian are too wasted to hear the voice::
~~~~~
::Sharpedge, Jetstorm, and Godfather transform and fly out, following the 
rest of the Mafia. they hear the voice::
Godfather: What the f*ck was that?
Sharpedge: I dont know.
Jetstorm: What do you think it is Shockaract?
~~~~~
::Gigatron and the Skyscorchers hear the voice. Gigatron turns to Herald::
Gigatron: What was that?
~~~~~
::My Destrons hear it, but each of them think its their imagination, so they 
dont bring it up::    

--part1_64.ab591e9.27a599a9_boundary
